summary: Two detectives seek a stripper's killer in the Japanese quarter of Los Angeles, but a love triangle threatens their friendship.
cast: Victoria Shaw|Glenn Corbett|James Shigeta|Anna Lee|Paul Dubov|Jaclynne Greene|Neyle Morrow|Gloria Pall|Pat Silver|George Yoshinaga|Kaye Elhardt|Aya Oyama|George Okamura|Ryosho S. Sogabe|Bob Okazaki|Fuji|Walter Burke|Jack Carol|Robert Kino|Harrison Lewis|David McMahon|Edo Mita|Torau Mori|Rollin Moriyama|Carol Nugent|Brian O'Hara|Stafford Repp|Nina Roman|Katie Sweet|Chiyo Tota
title: El kimono rojo
